SourceText: What information does the app collect about you and how do we use it?
text: Ki informashon e aplikashon ta kolektá tokante di bo i kon nos ta us’é?

SourceText:
_Personal Data_
For the purpose of this @global.privacy_policy, 'personal data' means any information that enables us to identify an individual, directly or indirectly. There are two categories of data that are collected a) information on the facilitator/implementer who is using the app b) information on the parents/caregiver under guidance of said facilitator.

Data collected about the facilitator include:
-   Name
-   State (location)

Data collected about the parent / caregiver participant include:
-   Name
-   Parent ID
-   Co-parent
-   Attendance data of in-person / WhatsApp sessions

The processing of your personal data is primarily based on:

The @global.app_name team has legitimate interests in carrying out research activities, under Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, regarding the sharing of limited details related to how you use the app.

_Log Data_
Whenever you use our app, we collect data and information (through third party services) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data includes information such as a truncated device Internet Protocol ("IP") address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilising our app, the time, date and your intentions within the app (which include but are not limited to any app buttons clicked or pages visited.)

_Cookies_
Cookies are small files that store data, often used to save user-specific information. They allow websites and apps to retrieve this stored information, enabling a more personalised and efficient user experience.

We use a number of third party services (see relevant section below) to support the functioning of the app. We use third party cookies through Firebase and GlitchTip and first party cookies through Matomo. In short, first-party cookies are from @global.app_name, and third-party cookies come from other places as described.

For further information on the handling of cookies see below:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

You have the option to adjust your browser settings to decline all or specific browser cookies or to notify you when sites initiate or access cookies. For android devices this should be done on the google chrome app. Remember, disabling cookies can affect the functionality of websites or web apps, as they may rely on these cookies for essential features. Always be sure about your decision before making these changes.

_Feedback Submissions_
Your feedback on the app is important to us. We shall always anonymise your personal information when sharing and publishing your feedback.

_Aggregate Data_
Your data is important to the @global.app_name team for broader research purposes. Aggregate data is always anonymised.
text:
_Datonan Personal_
Den kuadro di e @global.privacy_policy akí, ‘datonan personal’ ta nifiká kualke informashon ku ta permití nos identifiká un individuo, direktamente òf indirektamente. Tin dos kategoria di dato ku ta wòrdu kolektá a) informashon enkuanto e fasilitadó/implementadó ku ta usando e aplikashon b) informashon enkuanto e mayornan/dunadó di kuido bou di guia di e fasilitadó menshoná.

Datonan kolektá tokante e fasilitadó ta inkluí:
- Nòmber
- Estado (lokalidat)

Datonan kolektá tokante e partisipante di mayor/kuidadó ta inkluí:
- Nòmber
- Identifikashon di mayor
- Mayor ku ta kria yu huntu 
- Datonan di asistensia na seshonnan en persona / WhatsApp

E prosesamentu di bo datonan personal ta basá prinsipalmente riba:

E tim di @global.app_name tin interesnan legítimo den realisá aktividatnan di investigashon, bou di Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, tokante e kompartimentu di detayenan limitá relashoná ku kon bo ta usa e aplikashon.

_Dato di Registrashon_
Kada bes ku bo usa nos aplikashon, nos ta kolektá dato i informashon (pa medio di servisio di terser partido) riba bo telefòn yamá Dato di Registrashon. E Dato di Registrashon akí ta inkluí informashon manera un adrès di Protokòl di Internèt  (“IP”) abreviá di un aparato, nòmber di aparato, vershon di sistema di operashon, e konfigurashon di e aplikashon ora di usa nos aplikashon, e ora, fecha i bo intenshonnan denter di e aplikashon (ku ta inkluí pero no ta limitá na kualke boton di aplikashon ku bo a klek òf páginanan bishitá.)

_'Cookies'_
'Cookies' ta archivonan chikitu ku ta warda dato, hopi bia usá pa warda informashon spesífiko di usuario. Nan ta permití wèpsaitnan i aplikashonnan pa rekuperá e informashon wardá akí, loke ta permití un eksperensia di usuario mas personalisá i efisiente.

Nos ta usa un kantidat di servisio di terser partido (wak sekshon relevante mas abou) pa sostené e funshonamentu di e aplikashon. Nos ta usa 'cookie' di terser partido pa medio di Firebase i GlitchTip i 'cookie' di promé partido pa medio di Matomo. Pues, 'cookie' di promé partido ta di @global.app_name, i 'cookie' di terser partido ta bini di otro lugánan manera deskribí.

Pa mas informashon tokante e maneho di 'cookie' wak akí abou:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

Bo tin e opshon pa ahustá bo konfigurashonnan di 'browser' pa rechasá tur  'cookies' òf 'cookies' spesífiko di 'browser' òf pa risibí notifikashon ora wèpsaitnan inisiá òf haña akseso na 'cookie'. Pa aparatonan 'android' mester hasi esaki riba e aplikashon di Google Chrome. Tene kuenta ku ora bo desaktivá 'cookies', esaki por afektá e funshonalidat di wèpsaitnan òf aplikashonnan di wèp, ya ku nan por dependé di e 'cookies' akí pa funshonnan esensial. Semper sòru pa bo ta sigur di bo desishon promé ku hasi e kambionan akí.

_Duna Opinion_
Bo opinion enkuanto e aplikashon ta importante pa nos. Semper nos lo anonimisá bo informashon personal ora di kompartí i publiká bo opinion.

_Dato Agregá_
Bo datonan ta importante pa e tim di @global.app_name pa propósitonan di investigashon mas amplio. Datonan agregá semper ta anónimo.

SourceText: How we get your personal information and why we collect it
text: Kon nos ta haña bo informashon personal i dikon nos ta kolektá esaki

SourceText:
We process your data to provide support to you as well as the data of parents and caregivers which facilitators support. We process your data to communicate when you contact us, for security reasons as well as research purposes (see section ‘Information Sharing’). 

The primary research purpose includes looking to investigate the extent to which @global.app_name can support facilitators in their interactions of parents and caregivers of young children. Parents and caregivers will be receiving primary parenting messages through ParentText (a chatbot) of which facilitators will be engaging with such parents over WhatsApp. During the course of research, the study team may use aggregated and anonymised data from the app for further research projects. Finally, please note that we may process your data without your knowledge or consent, where this is required or permitted by law.
text:
Nos ta prosesá bo datonan pa duna bo sosten i tambe e datonan di mayornan i dunadónan di kuido ku fasilitádonan ta sostené. Nos ta prosesá bo datonan pa komuniká ora bo tuma kontakto ku nos, pa motibunan di seguridat i tambe pa propósitonan di investigashon (mira sekshon ‘Kompartí Informashon’).

E propósito prinsipal di e investigashon ta inkluí buska pa investigá te na unda @global.app_name por sostené fasilitadónan den nan interakshonnan ku mayornan i kuidadónan di muchanan chikitu. Mayornan i dunadónan di kuido lo risibí mensahenan di edukashon familiar primario pa medio di ParentText (un 'chatbot'), di kua fasilitadónan lo ta den kontakto ku e mayornan ei via WhatsApp. Durante di investigashon, e tim di estudio por usa datonan agregá i anónimo for di e aplikashon pa mas proyekto di investigashon. Finalmente, por fabor tene na kuenta ku nos por prosesá bo datonan sin bo konosementu òf konsentimentu, kaminda esaki ta rekerí òf permití pa lei.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Information Sharing
text: Kompartimentu di Informashon

SourceText:
Limited internal IDEMS staff may have access to log data collected via the app, as necessary to perform their duties regarding the operation of the app. These data will only be accessed on a need-to-know basis, and all team members with access to the data are bound to confidentiality.

You agree that your personal information may be shared with third parties such as researchers and partners involved in the improvement or implementation of the app including those outside your country. Prior to the disclosure of information with research partners we will make anonymous to the extent possible and where appropriate information such as log data. In reading and accepting this @global.privacy_policy, you permit us to use your anonymized data in published research.

You agree that we may transfer your log data outside your country, for example, to administer cloud services. We will ensure that any country, company or person that we pass your personal information to agrees to treat your information with the same level of protection as we are obliged to.

_Legal_
The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this @global.privacy_policy.
text:
Personal interno limitá di IDEMS por tin akseso na datonan di registro kolektá via di e aplikashon, segun ta nesesario pa kumpli ku nan tareanan pa loke ta trata e operashon di e aplikashon. Lo tin akseso na e datonan akí solamente riba un base di nesesidat i tur miembro di e tim ku tin akseso na e datonan ta mará na konfidensialidat.

Bo ta bai di akuerdo ku por kompartí bo informashon personal ku terser partidonan manera investigadónan i partnernan enbolbí den e mehorashon òf implementashon di e aplikashon inkluyendo esnan pafó di bo pais. Promé ku e divulgashon di informashon ku partnernan di investigashon nos lo hasi anónimo te na e grado ku ta posibel i kaminda ta apropiá, informashon manera dato di registrashon. Lesando i aseptando e @global.privacy_policy akí, bo ta permití nos usa bo datonan anónimo den investigashon publiká.

Bo ta bai di akuerdo ku nos por transferí bo datonan di registrashon pafó di bo pais, por ehèmpel, pa atministrá servisio di 'cloud'. Nos lo sòru pa kualke pais, kompania òf persona ku nos ta pasa bo informashon personal na dje ta bai di akuerdo pa trata bo informashon ku e mesun nivel di protekshon manera nos ta obligá na tin.

_Legal_
Nos lo retené e informashon ku nos pidi i lo usa esaki manera deskribí den e @global.privacy_policy akí.

SourceText: Third Party Service Providers and Websites
text: Proveedónan di Servisio di Terser Partido i Wèpsaitnan

SourceText:
The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. We do so for the following reasons:
-   To facilitate our app
-   To provide the app on our behalf
-   To perform app-related services; or
-   To assist us in analysing how our app is used.

We want to inform users of this app that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Links to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app:
-   [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
-   [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
-   [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
-   [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
-   [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

This app may contain links to other sites that are not covered by this @global.privacy_policy. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. This @global.privacy_policy applies only to the processing of your information by this app. It does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which this app links to.
text:
E aplikashon ta usa servisio di terser partido ku por kolektá informashon usá pa identifiká bo. Nos ta hasi esaki pa e siguiente motibunan:
- Pa fasilitá nos aplikashon
- Pa proveé e aplikashon na nos nòmber
- Pa duna servisio relashoná ku e aplikashon; òf
- Pa asistí nos den analisá kon nos aplikashon ta wòrdu usá.

Nos ke informá usuarionan di e aplikashon akí, ku e terser partidonan akí tin akseso na bo Informashon Personal. E motibu ta pa hasi e tareanan asigná na nan, na nos nòmber. Sinembargo, nan ta obligá pa no divulgá òf usa e informashon pa kualke otro propósito.

Lenknan pa e polítikanan di privasidat di dunadónan di servisio di terser partido ku e aplikashon ta usa:
- [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
- [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
- [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

E aplikashon akí por kontené lenknan pa otro wèpsaitnan ku no ta kubri pa e @global.privacy_policy akí. Si bo klek riba un lenk di terser partido, lo bo wòrdu dirigí na e wèpsait ei. E @global.privacy_policy akí ta konta solamente pa e prosesamentu di bo informashon dor di e aplikashon akí. E no ta atendé i nos no ta responsabel pa, e privasidat, informashon, òf otro práktikanan di kualke terser partido, inkluyendo kualke terser partido ku ta operá kualke wèpsait òf servisio na kua e aplikashon akí ta di lenk na dje.

SourceText: How long do we keep your data?
text: Kuantu tempu nos ta warda bo datonan?

SourceText: We will retain your personal information for as long as we need it to fulfil our purposes, including any relating to app services as well as legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
text: Nos lo retené bo informashon personal pa e kantidat di tempu ku nos mester di dje pa kumpli ku nos propósitonan, inkluyendo kualke proposito relashoná ku servisio di aplikashon i tambe rekisitonan legal, di kontabilidat òf di reportahe.

SourceText: How do we keep your data secure?
text: Kon nos ta tene bo datonan sigur?

SourceText: We value your trust in providing us your personal information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. We also reserve the right to the storage of your data on third party servers or databases outside of the listed @global.app_name team (refer to the section on Third Party Service Providers and Websites). Therefore usage of the app is at your own risk.
text: Nos ta balorá bo konfiansa pa duna nos bo informashon personal, pues nos ta hasi esfuerso pa usa medionan komersialmente aseptabel pa proteh’é. Pero kòrda ku ningun método di transmishon via internèt, òf método di almasenamentu elektróniko ta 100% sigur i konfiabel, i nos no por garantisá su seguridat apsoluto. Nos ta reservá tambe e derecho riba e almasenamentu di bo datonan riba 'servers' òf basenan di dato di terser partido pafó di e tim @global.app_name menshoná (referí na e sekshon riba Proveedónan di Servisio di Terser Partido i Wèpsaitnan). P’esei uso di e aplikashon ta riba bo propio riesgo.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Children’s Privacy
text: Privasidat di Mucha

SourceText: This app is not targeted towards anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18.
text: E aplikashon akí no ta dirigí na niun hende bou di edat di 18 aña. Nos no ta kolektá informashon personalmente identifikabel di personanan bou di 18 aña.

SourceText: Your data protection rights
text: Bo derechonan di protekshon di dato

SourceText:
Under data protection law, you have rights including:

_Your right of access_ - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information.

_Your right to rectification_ - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete.

_Your right to erasure_ - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to withdraw consent for data processing at any time_ - You can choose to halt the processing of your data if consent was the legal basis for handling your information.

_Your right to restriction of processing_ - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to object to processing_ - You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to data portability_ - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances.

You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. Depending on the circumstances and the nature of your request it may not be possible for us to do what you have asked, for example, where there is a statutory or contractual requirement for us to process your data and it would not be possible to fulfil our legal obligations if we were to stop. Further information on your rights is available from the [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).
text:
Bou di lei di protekshon di dato, bo tin derechonan inkluyendo:

_Bo derecho di akseso_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos kopianan di bo informashon personal.

_Bo derecho riba rektifikashon_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa drecha informashon personal ku bo ta kere no ta eksakto. Tambe bo tin derecho di pidi nos pa kompletá informashon ku bo ta kere ta inkompleto.

_Bo derecho di eliminá_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa eliminá bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho di retirá konsentimentu pa prosesamentu di dato na kualke momento_ - Bo por skohe pa stòp e prosesamentu di bo datonan si konsentimentu tabata e base legal pa manehá bo informashon.

_Bo derecho riba restrikshon di prosesamentu_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa restringí e prosesamentu di bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho di oponé prosesamentu_ - Bo tin e derecho di oponé prosesamentu di bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho riba portabilidat di dato_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi pa nos transferí e informashon personal ku bo a duna nos na un otro organisashon, òf na abo, den sierto sirkunstansianan.

Bo no ta obligá di paga ningun kosto pa ehersé bo derechonan. Dependiendo di e sirkunstansianan i e naturalesa di bo petishon kisas no ta posibel pa nos hasi loke bo a pidi, por ehèmpel, kaminda tin un rekisito statutario òf kontraktual pa nos prosesá bo datonan i e lo no ta posibel pa kumpli ku nos obligashonnan legal si nos lo mester stòp. Mas informashon tokante bo derechonan ta disponibel serka e [Ofisina di Komishon di Informashon (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).

SourceText: Removing the app
text: Kita e aplikashon

SourceText: We are sorry if you find our app no longer useful. Should you decide to remove our app, we may still retain some of your data (although anonymised) to troubleshoot, aid in investigations, comply with legal requirements or to add to our existing research data sets.
text: Nos diskulpa si bo no ta haña nos aplikashon útil mas. Si bo disidí di kita nos aplikashon, nos por retené algun di bo datonan (ounke anónimo) pa solushoná problema, yuda den investigashonnan, kumpli ku rekisitonan legal òf pa agregá na nos sètnan di dato di investigashon eksistente.

SourceText: Changes to the @global.privacy_policy
text: Kambionan na @global.privacy_policy
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: We may update our @global.privacy_policy from time to time. You waive your right to be notified directly of changes and are advised to review this page periodically for any updates. Your continued use of the app suggests you agree to subsequent revisions of the @global.privacy_policy.
text: Nos por aktualisá nos @global.privacy_policy de bes en kuando. Bo ta renunsiá bo derecho di wòrdu notifiká direktamente di kambionan i ta wòrdu konsehá pa revisá e página akí periódikamente pa kualke aktualisashon. Bo uso kontinuo di e aplikashon ta sugerí ku bo ta bai di akuerdo ku siguiente revishonnan di e @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText:
If you have any questions or suggestions about our @global.privacy_policy, complaints or otherwise do not hesitate to contact us at <apps@idems.international>.

If your concerns are not adequately addressed, you retain the right to file a complaint with the Information Commissioner's Office. You can reach them at 03031231113, contact them via https://ico.org.uk/global/contact-us/, or mail to the Information Commissioner’s Office, Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, England, UK.

SourceText: User Agreement
text: Akuerdo di Usuario

SourceText: Rules of Usage
text: Reglanan di Uso

SourceText: @global.app_name is open-source, which means that its codebase can be found on GitHub for the wider software developer community. However, it's against the terms of use to alter the existing application or its materials, or to replicate any trademarks from the @global.app_name team. Although open source, refrain from translating the software into other languages or creating alternate versions without crediting the @global.app_name team. Unauthorised access to confidential user data is forbidden. It's not acceptable to provide false information about yourself when using the app, make unfounded claims of affiliation, or inaccurately report the app's behaviour. Ensure that your usage of the app adheres to all local rules and laws. Finally in accessing and using the app, we believe you not to be a minor in your country of residence.
text: @global.app_name ta 'open-source', loke ta nifiká ku su base di kódigo por wòrdu hañá riba GitHub pa e komunidat di desaroyadó di 'software' mas amplio. Sinembargo, ta kontra di e kondishonnan di uso pa alterá e aplikashon eksistente òf su materialnan, òf pa repliká kualke marka di e tim di @global.app_name. Ounke e ta 'open source', apstené di tradusí e 'software' den otro idiomanan òf krea vershonnan alternativo sin duna krédito na e tim di @global.app_name. Akseso no outorisá na datonan konfidensial di usuario ta prohibí. No ta aseptabel pa duna informashon falsu tokante bo mes ora di usa e aplikashon, hasi deklarashonnan infundá di afiliashon, òf reportá informe inkorekto tokante e komportashon di e aplikashon. Sòru pa bo uso di e aplikashon ta kumpli ku tur regla i lei lokal. Finalmente den akseso i uso di e aplikashon, nos ta asumí ku bo no ta un ménor di edat den bo pais di residensia.

SourceText: Content Changes
text: Kambionan di Kontenido

SourceText:
The @global.app_name team is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and user friendly as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app which will be delivered through updates. At present the app is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way.

In the future it is possible that some services may be offered that would incur a cost. We will never charge you for the app or its services without clearly making known to you first any access charges applicable.
text:
E tim di @global.app_name ta komprometé na garantisá ku e aplikashon ta mas útil i fásil pa usa posibel. Pa e motibu ei, nos ta reservá e derecho di hasi kambionan na e aplikashon ku lo wòrdu implementá pa medio di aktualisashonnan. Aktualmente e aplikashon ta grátis i nos intenshon ta pa e keda asina.

Ta posibel ku den futuro por ofresé algun servisio ku lo ta mará na gastu. Nos lo no kobra bo nunka pa e aplikashon òf su servisionan sin notifiká bo klaramente promé ku kualke gastu di akseso aplikabel.

SourceText: Disclaimer
text: Limitashon di responsabilidat

SourceText:
Please be aware that the @global.app_name team exclude responsibility for the following:

1. Certain functions of the app will require the app to have an active internet connection. The @global.app_name team cannot take responsibility for the app not working at full functionality if you do not have access to Wi-Fi, or you do not have any of your data allowance left.

2. Using the app outside of an area with Wi-Fi, will mean that your terms of agreement with your mobile network provider will still apply. As a result, you may be charged by your mobile provider for the cost of data for the duration of the connection while accessing the app, or other third party charges. In using the app, you accept responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the app outside of your home territory (i.e. region or country) without turning off data roaming. If you are not the bill payer for the device on which you are using the app, please be aware that we assume that you have received permission from the bill payer for using the app.

3. Although we endeavour to ensure that the app is updated and its content accurate, we do rely on third parties to provide information to us so that we can make it available to you. We do not regularly check out all of the external sites and cannot guarantee that they are always accurate or reliable.

4. The @global.app_name team accepts no liability for any damage or loss, direct or indirect, you experience as a result of using the app, or arising from any reliance you may place on advice or information provided from the app. You should always exercise your own discretion and judgement appropriate to your own circumstances in relation to any advice or information provided from the app.

5. Any instances of software bugs, viruses or other malicious material transmitted by a third party through our site are a regret, but we are devoid of responsibility.

6. Updates to the app occur regularly in order to improve performance and content. The app is available on Android -- the requirements for this system (and for any additional systems we decide to extend the availability of the app to) may change. It is your responsibility to download app updates to keep using the app. The @global.app_name team does not promise that it will always update the app so that it is relevant to you and/or works with the Android version that you have installed on your device. However, you agree to always accept updates to the application when offered to you.

7. The app site might not be available at all times for reasons of maintenance or trouble with associated software or hardware. Whilst we apologise for inconveniences, we are not liable for any loss you may incur should the site not be accessible or is withdrawn. Equally, we have the right and choice to terminate your access and use of the app (including availability of captured data) at any time, without warning. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licences granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must stop using the app, and (if needed) delete it from your device.

8. You agree to indemnify, at your own expense, the @global.app_name, its officials, employees, consultants and agents, against any claims, including your costs and expenses, by any third party, resulting from your use of the app.

9. Companies or products associated with the app should not be interpreted as endorsement by the app or the @global.app_name team or demonstrate an intention to infringe proprietary rights.

SourceText: Send this message after your WhatsApp Call
text: Manda e mensahe akí despues di bo Yamada di WhatsApp

SourceText:
Hi! Thank you for volunteering to lead the group discussions. 

*While engaging with other parents in the group, keep the following in mind*: 

👋 Greet parents when engaging with them.

💛 Respect what participants share and be aware of different ages, genders, values and circumstances. 

🏅 Encourage parents to share and respond to each other - and praise them for it.

🔔 Remind parents of ground rules when needed.

🔑 Model the behaviour you want to see among the parents.
text:
Hei! Danki pa ta boluntario pa dirigí e diskushonnan di grupo. 

*Miéntras bo ta atendé ku otro mayornan den e grupo, tene lo siguiente na mente*: 

👋 Saludá mayornan ora bo ta atendé ku nan.

💛 Respetá loke e partisipantenan ta kompartí i ta konsiente di diferente edat, sekso, balor i sirkunstansia. 

🏅 Enkurasha mayornan pa kompartí kontestá otro - i elogia nan pa esaki.

🔔 Kòrda mayornan riba reglanan básiko ora ta nesesario.

🔑 Duna ehèmpel di e komportashon ku bo ke mira bou di e mayornan.

SourceText: When should the group admin respond to messages?
text: Ki ora e atministradó di grupo mester kontestá mensahenan?

SourceText:
⏰ Participants may send messages at any time during the week. To keep your workload manageable, you can respond to messages once or twice a day, depending on your schedule. 

👍 You can also respond to messages with a relevant emoji or short response when you can.
text:
⏰ Partisipantenan por manda mensahe na kualke momento durante siman. Pa tene bo karga di trabou manehabel, bo por kontestá mensahenan un òf dos biaha pa dia, dependiendo di bo tempu. 

👍 Bo por kontestá mensahenan tambe ku un emoji relevante òf un kontesta kòrtiku ora bo por.

SourceText: Send this message to the group admin volunteers.
text: Manda e mensahe akí pa e administradó di grupo boluntario.

SourceText:
Hi!😃Thank you for your message. 

My role with @global.prog_name was limited. I unfortunately will not be further involved with the programme. 

If your WhatsApp Support group is still active, feel free to post your questions in the group. Other parents may be able to support you with helpful suggestions. 💡
text:
Kon a bai!😃Danki pa bo mensahe. 

Mi ròl ku @global.prog_name tabata limitá. Lamentablemente lo mi no ta enbolbí mas ku e programa. 

Si bo grupo di Sosten di WhatsApp ta aktivo ainda, sinti bo liber pa pone bo preguntanan den e grupo. Otro mayornan kisas por apoyá bo ku sugerensia útil. 💡
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Here are some prompts you can use with the parent group: 

🎉Let us celebrate our successes! What was something positive you experienced when you tried one of the @global.prog_name skills with your child?

🌱Trying out new skills can be hard at first. What was something *difficult* that you experienced when you tried a @global.prog_name skill with your child at home?

💙You are welcome to use this WhatsApp space to share any questions or experiences you have on your @global.prog_name journey. Remember, I may not always be able to respond, but this is our group – *together we can find all the answers we need*!
text:
Aki algun instrukshon ku bo por usa ku e grupo di mayor: 

🎉Laga nos selebrá nos éksitonan! Kiko tabata algu positivo ku bo a eksperensiá ora bo a purba un di e abilidatnan di @global.prog_name ku bo yu?

🌱Purba abilidatnan nobo por ta difísil na promé instante. Kiko tabata algu *difísil* ku bo a eksperensiá ora bo a purba un abilidat @global.prog_name ku bo yu na kas?

💙Bo ta bon biní pa usa e espasio di WhatsApp akí pa kompartí kualke pregunta òf eksperensia ku bo tin riba bo biahe di @global.prog_name. Kòrda, kisas no ta semper mi por kontestá, pero esaki ta nos grupo – *huntu nos por haña tur e kontesta ku nos mester*!

SourceText:

Since we don’t have any volunteers for group admin, I will be closing this WhatsApp Support Group at the end of the Programme. 

Remember, you can still continue your @global.prog_name journey with your family!
text:
Danki pa kompartí bo pensamentunan 💙

Komo ku nos no tin ningun boluntario pa atministrá e grupo, mi lo sera e Grupo di Sosten di WhatsApp akí na final di e Programa. 

Kòrda, bo por sigui bo biahe di @global.prog_name ku bo famia!
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Hello 👋

Thank you for sharing your thoughts about the programme. I’m sorry that you’re facing challenges. Here are a couple of things you can try: 

1️⃣If there’s a skill or goal that you are finding difficult, remember you can always go back and rewatch the stories. Practice makes perfect! ✨

2️⃣If you feel comfortable, please feel free to chat about the areas you’re finding tough with your peers in the WhatsApp Support Group. Your peers might have some helpful tips 👍

Remember, everyone’s learning journey is unique, and change takes time. But trust me, if you keep practising the skills you’ve learned, you’ll start to see progress. 🏅
text:
Kon a bai? 👋

Danki pa kompartí bo pensamentunan tokante e programa. Mi ta lamentá ku bo ta konfrontando retonan. Akí tin un par di kos ku bo por purba: 

1️⃣Si tin un abilidat òf meta ku bo ta haña difísil, kòrda ku semper bo por bai bèk i wak e historianan di nobo. Mas bo praktiká, mas mihó bo ta bira! ✨

2️⃣Si bo ta sinti bo kómodo, por fabor sinti bo liber pa kòmbersá tokante e áreanan ku bo ta haña difísil ku otronan den e Grupo di Sosten di WhatsApp. Nan por tin algun tep útil 👍

Kòrda, tur hende su trayekto di siñamentu ta úniko i kambio ta tuma tempu. Pero konfia mi, si bo sigui praktiká e abilidatnan ku bo a siña, lo bo kuminsá mira progreso. 🏅

SourceText: Message of Support
text: Mensahe di Sosten

SourceText:
Hello 👋

Thank you for sharing your feelings. 
It’s okay to have fears or feel sad when something you’ve been a part of is ending. 

Remember, 

1️⃣Even though @global.prog_name is ending, your journey can continue. You have gained some ⭐amazing ⭐parenting skills that you can carry with you. 

2️⃣The WhatsApp group can be a source of support well beyond the programme. Keep sharing your success and struggles in the WhatsApp Support Group, or with your peers. 

3️⃣If you ever want to go back to any parenting skills or goals, you are review our chats. Practise makes perfect ✨

You did great throughout your @global.prog_name journey!

Hello Everyone ⭐,

👀 We want our group to be positive for everyone, and that means following the rules.

💚 Unfortunately, someone had to be removed because they weren't following the rules despite reminders.

Let's keep things respectful and supportive.

See you in the next chat session!
text:
Kon a bai Tur Hende?⭐,

👀 Nos ke pa nos grupo ta positivo pa tur hende, i esei ta nifiká sigui e reglanan.

💚 Lamentablemente, mester a saka un hende pasobra e no tabata sigui e reglanan apesar di rekordatorionan.

Ban mantené rèsptèt i sostené otro. 

Nos ta topa den e siguiente seshon di kòmbersashon!

SourceText: Send This Message to the Parent
text: Manda e Mensahe Akí pa e Mayor

SourceText:
Hi!😃Thank you for your message. 

My role in this activity is limited to sharing messages in the group only. I unfortunately do not have the capacity to respond to each individual message.😔

🔑 If you are comfortable posting your questions in the group, please feel free to do so during our chat sessions! 💡
text:
Kon a bai?😃Danki pa bo mensahe. 

Mi ròl den e aktividat akí ta limitá na kompartí mensahenan den e grupo so. Lamentablemente mi no tin e kapasidat pa kontestá na kada mensahe individual.😔

🔑 Si bo ta sinti bo kómodo pa pone bo preguntanan den e grupo, por fabor sinti bo liber pa hasi esaki durante nos seshonnan di kòmbersashon! 💡

SourceText: Reminder for Participation
text: Rekordatorio pa Partisipashon

SourceText:
🔔 Quick Reminder:

We all benefit when everyone joins in! Your experiences are important. Share your thoughts and let's keep this group lively and supportive for everyone. 🌷
text:
🔔 Rekordatorio Rápido:

Nos tur ta benefisiá ora tur hende djòin! Bo eksperensianan ta importante. Kompartí bo pensamentunan i ban tene e grupo akí bibu i kaminda nos tur ta sostené otro. 🌷

SourceText: Praising active parents
text: Duna elogio na mayornan aktivo

SourceText:
Big shoutout to those actively participating! 

🌟 Your experiences matter. 

If you haven't shared yet, we'd love to hear from you too. 

Every parent is important! 💚
text:
Un 'shoutout' grandi na esnan ku ta partisipá aktivamente! 

🌟 Bo eksperensianan ta importante. 

Si bo no a kompartí ainda, nos lo ke tende di bo tambe. 

Tur mayor ta importante! 💚

SourceText: Setting expectations for the group
text: Pone ekspektativanan pa e grupo

SourceText:
Just a friendly reminder: This group is a safe space for sharing and learning. 💙

We encourage everyone to participate and make this a positive experience for all. 🌱

Let's build a supportive community together! 🌷
text:
Djis un rekordatorio amistoso: E grupo akí ta un espasio seif pa kompartí i siña. 💙

Nos ta enkurashá un i tur pa partisipá i hasi esaki un eksperensia positivo pa un i tur. 🌱

Ban konstruí huntu un komunidat ku ta sostené otro! 🌷

SourceText: Privately messaging the parent
text: Mandando mensahe privá na e mayor

SourceText:
Hi there! 👋 

We've noticed you haven't shared much in the group. 

Is there anything specific you'd like to see or discuss? 

Your input is important to us!

Feel free to share your thoughts. 😊
text:
Hei konta? 👋 

Nos a nota ku bo no a kompartí hopi den e grupo. 

Tin algu spesífiko ku bo ke mira òf diskutí? 

Bo aporte ta importante pa nos!

Sinti bo liber pa kompartí bo pensamentunan. 😊

SourceText: Directly ask a specific parent to share
text: Puntra un mayor spesífiko direktamente pa kompartí

SourceText: [Enter a Parent's Name], we'd love to hear about your week with @global.prog_name. Would you be interested in sharing how it went?
text: [Hinka Nòmber di un Mayor], nos lo ke tende tokante bo siman ku @global.prog_name. Bo ta interesá pa kompartí kon el a bai?

SourceText: Before hitting send, please make sure to tag a specific parent by typing @Parent’s Name
text: Promé ku bo primi manda, por fabor hasi sigur di tag un mayor spesífiko dor di skirbi @Nòmber di Mayor

SourceText: Check if it is a good time for WhatsApp Chat
text: Kontrolá si ta un bon momentu pa WhatsApp Chat

SourceText:
Hello Parents, 👋

⏱️I value your time and want to ensure our chat is convenient for everyone. 

⭐Does this time work well for our conversations? 

🔔Is there another time that works for you? 

Your input matters!
text:
Kon a bai Mayornan? 👋

⏱️Mi ta balorá boso tempu i ke sòru pa nos kòmbersashon kumbiní tur hende. 

⭐E orario akí ta funshoná bon pa nos kombersashonnan? 

🔔Tin un otro orario ku ta funshoná pa bo? 

Bo aporte ta importante!

text: Investigashon i materialnan ku a forma e programa akí

The structure and content of this current programme were drawn and adapted from the following key resource materials:

Lachman, J. & Hutchings, J. (2018) _Parenting for Lifelong Health Programme for Young Children – Facilitator Manual_. European Version. Fifth Edition
